doc.after: Habitat destruction vastly increases an area s vulnerability to natural disasters like flood and drought crop failure spread of disease and water contamination 15 On the other hand a healthy ecosystem with good management practices will reduce the chance of these events happening or will at least mitigate adverse impacts
